item.title: "I Could Genuinely Be Retiring": Robert Pattinson Addresses When The Batman Trilogy Could Finally End
item.description: Robert Pattinson, who will to return to Matt Reeves' The Batman universe, addresses his potential DC movie future after the trilogy finally ends.

item.title: Every Roland Emmerich Movie Ranked Worst To Best
item.description: THe king of disaster movies, here is a comprehensive guide to every film directed by Roland Emmerich, ranked worst to best.

item.title: Spider-Man 4: 5 Villains Who Could Return in the MCU Sequel
item.description: In the MCU's Spider-Man 4, Screen Rant thinks these Marvel villains should return.
